dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so, this whole "Migrant" operation in Kazakhstan, is it, like, really about security, or is there, uh, something else going on?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so, this whole Migrant operation in Kazakhstan, is it, like, really about security, or is there, uh, something else going on?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, totally! Because they identified almost ten thousand violators, like, in just four days!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, totally! Because they identified almost ten thousand violators, like, in just four days!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Ministry of Internal Affairs reported on the results of the operational and preventive measure "Migrant", which took place from March 11 to 14. During the OPM, almost 10 thousand violators of migration legislation were identified, according to Polisia.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Ten thousand! And not just neighbors, um, Bangladesh, Egypt, even Italy! Nigeria!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Ten thousand! And not just neighbors, um, Bangladesh, Egypt, even Italy! Nigeria!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the OPM, almost 10 thousand violators of migration legislation were identified... However, during the operational and preventive measure, illegal migrants from Bangladesh, Egypt, Italy, Nigeria and Madagascar were also identified.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Italy, right? I saw that! And Madagascar!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Italy, right? I saw that! And Madagascar!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: However, during the operational and preventive measure, illegal migrants from Bangladesh, Egypt, Italy, Nigeria and Madagascar were also identified.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Unbelievable. And then two thousand two hundred hosts fined for not notifying!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Unbelievable. And then two thousand two hundred hosts fined for not notifying!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 2200 hosts have been brought to administrative responsibility for failure to notify foreigners of their arrival in a timely manner, with fines exceeding 12 million tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And five hundred employers, like, 33 million tenge in fines! That's huge.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And five hundred employers, like, thirty three million tenge in fines! That's huge.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 500 employers have been fined 33 million tenge for illegally hiring foreigners.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That's huge! But then you get to the actual, uh, criminal stuff, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's huge! But then you get to the actual, uh, criminal stuff, you know?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The university commandant! Giving fake permits for money? That's just wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The university commandant! Giving fake permits for money? That's just wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Among the suspects is the commandant of a dormitory at a capital university, who, for a monetary reward, issued temporary residence permits to 56 migrants under the guise of students.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally wild! And a notary's assistant, like, forging powers of attorney.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally wild! And a notary's assistant, like, forging powers of attorney.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the Almaty region, a notary's assistant made forged powers of attorney for the fictitious registration of foreigners.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! So it's not just, um, migrants, it's the people inside the system exploiting it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! So it's not just, um, migrants, it's the people inside the system exploiting it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And the "helpers" charging for services that are totally free, come on.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And the helpers charging for services that are totally free, come on.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "We call on foreign guests and our citizens to avoid so-called "helpers" who charge for dubious services. The state does not charge for notification of the stay of foreigners, registration of IIN, dactorial registration and temporary residence permit," he noted.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's just a whole, uh, a whole ecosystem of rule-breaking, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's just a whole, uh, a whole ecosystem of rule-breaking, isn't it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So is this whole "Migrant" operation, like, too broad then? Catching everyone?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So is this whole Migrant operation, like, too broad then? Catching everyone?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I don't know, but nearly ten thousand people in four days? That's, um, a lot of people.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I don't know, but nearly ten thousand people in four days? That's, um, a lot of people.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Ministry of Internal Affairs reported on the results of the operational and preventive measure "Migrant", which took place from March 11 to 14. During the OPM, almost 10 thousand violators of migration legislation were identified, according to Polisia.kz.
